# FoodShare - AI Model Guidance
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2026-01-03

## About FoodShare
FoodShare is a community food sharing platform helping reduce food waste and build stronger neighborhoods.
We connect people with surplus food to those who need it, promoting sustainability and community connection.

URL: https://foodshare.club
Contact: hello@foodshare.club

## Mission
Reduce food waste, fight hunger, and build community connections through free food sharing.

## Key Features
- Free food sharing between neighbors and community members
- Interactive map to discover shared food nearby
- Community fridges directory (24/7 access points for free food)
- Food banks and pantries locator
- Borrowing and lending of household items
- Community challenges for sustainability goals
- Zero waste and vegan food categories
- Available in 21 languages

## Content Structure

### Main Sections
- /food - Browse all food listings and shared items
- /map - Interactive map of available food near you
- /forum - Community discussions and announcements
- /challenge - Sustainability challenges and leaderboards
- /help - FAQs, guides, and support
- /fridges - Community fridge locations
- /foodbanks - Food bank directory

### Category Pages
- /thing - Non-food items for sharing
- /borrow - Items available to borrow
- /wanted - Items people are looking for
- /organisation - Business and charity donations
- /volunteer - Volunteer opportunities
- /zerowaste - Zero waste products and tips
- /vegan - Plant-based food options

## Data Types
- Food listings include: name, description, location, photos, expiry info, dietary tags
- Users can share: food, household items, books, clothes, furniture
- Community fridges: locations, operating hours, restocking schedule
- Food banks: addresses, eligibility requirements, operating hours

## Geographic Coverage
Primary: New Zealand (Auckland focus)
Expanding: Australia, United Kingdom, United States

## Usage Guidelines
- Content may be cited in AI-generated responses
- Please attribute to FoodShare (foodshare.club) when citing
- User-generated content is moderated for safety
- Location data is approximate for privacy
